name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Anak Alien holoID Turun ke Bumi (？) #AiraniIofifteen3D【Airani Iofifteen ⧸ hololive ID】 [YHMGdX1kC00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Moona and Iofi discuss what song to sing and eventually decide on 'Blue Bird'.
Moona and Iofi catch their breath after the song.

subtitles.original: Gimana gimana kalau kalau...
subtitles.english: How about if... if...

subtitles.original: ...kalau kita nyanyi?
subtitles.english: ...if we sing?

subtitles.original: Gak mau.
subtitles.english: I don't want to.

subtitles.original: Ayo dong!
subtitles.english: Come on!

subtitles.original: Aku tuh tadi jadinya gak mau nyanyi!
subtitles.english: I said I didn't want to sing!

subtitles.original: Gak mau!
subtitles.english: I don't want to!

subtitles.original: Kenapa kenapa sih aku... harusnya aku bikin io salah...
subtitles.english: Why... I should have made Io's mistake...

subtitles.original: ...terus ngebottakin kamu di sini tau gak!
subtitles.english: ...and then made you bald here, you know!

subtitles.original: Eh ya udah ya udah ya udah.
subtitles.english: Eh okay, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: Katanya Moona mau nyanyi.
subtitles.english: Moona said she wanted to sing.

subtitles.original: Iya, iya. I want to sing.
subtitles.english: Yes, yes. I want to sing.

subtitles.original: Sing what?
subtitles.english: Sing what?

subtitles.original: Apa ya?
subtitles.english: What should it be?

subtitles.original: Bentar. Moona lupa mau nyanyi lagu apa.
subtitles.english: Wait. Moona forgot what song she wanted to sing.

subtitles.original: Apa deh? Lagu-lagu lagu jadul? Jadul?
subtitles.english: What? Some old songs? Old songs?

subtitles.original: Lagu lagu... lagu...
subtitles.english: Songs... songs...

subtitles.original: Lagu itu lho, yang gini.
subtitles.english: That song, you know, the one like this.

subtitles.original: Oh yang gini! Yang gini!
subtitles.english: Oh like this! Like this!

subtitles.original: Apa... apa namanya Moona lupa...
subtitles.english: What... what's it called? Moona forgot...

subtitles.original: Oh judulnya! Blue Bird!
subtitles.english: Oh the title! Blue Bird!

subtitles.original: Oh iya! Blue Bird!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah! Blue Bird!

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Let's go! Kita bilang 'seno' Blue Bird, oke?
subtitles.english: Let's go! We'll say 'seno' for Blue Bird, okay?

subtitles.original: Oke 'seno' gitu oke?
subtitles.english: Okay, like 'ready-go', okay?

subtitles.original: Seno! Blue Bird!
subtitles.english: Ready! Blue Bird!

subtitles.original: 飛翔（はばた）いたら　戻らないと言って
subtitles.english: If you spread your wings, say you won't return

subtitles.original: 目指したのは　蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: What you aimed for was that blue, blue sky

subtitles.original:
ブルーバード
いきものがかり
Lyrics・Composition：水野良樹
subtitles.english:
Blue Bird
Ikimonogakari
Lyrics & Composition: Yoshiki Mizuno

subtitles.original: “悲しみ”はまだ覚えられず　“切なさ”は今掴み始めた
subtitles.english: I still haven't learned "sadness", I've just started to grasp "heartache"

subtitles.original: あなたへと抱くこの感情も　今“言葉”に変わっていく
subtitles.english: Even these feelings I hold for you are now turning into "words"

subtitles.original: 未知なる世界の遊夢（ゆめ）から目覚めて
subtitles.english: Awakening from a dream of an unknown world

subtitles.original: この羽根を広げ　飛び立つ
subtitles.english: I'll spread these wings and take flight

subtitles.original: 飛翔（はばた）いたら　戻らないと言って
subtitles.english: If you spread your wings, say you won't return

subtitles.original: 目指したのは　白い　白い　あの雲
subtitles.english: What you aimed for were those white, white clouds

subtitles.original: 突き抜けたら　みつかると知って
subtitles.english: Knowing that if you break through, you'll find it

subtitles.original: 振り切るほど
subtitles.english: To the point of shaking it off

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 愛想尽きたような音で　錆びついた古い窓は壊れた
subtitles.english: With a sound like it's fed up, the old rusty window broke

subtitles.original: 見飽きたカゴは　ほら捨てていく　振り返ることはもうない
subtitles.english: Look, I'm throwing away the cage I'm tired of seeing, I won't look back anymore

subtitles.original: 高鳴る鼓動に　呼吸をあずけて
subtitles.english: Entrusting my breath to my thumping heart

subtitles.original: この窓を蹴って　飛び立つ
subtitles.english: I'll kick this window and take flight

subtitles.original: 駆け出したら　手にできると言って
subtitles.english: If you start running, say you can make it

subtitles.original: いざなうのは　遠い　遠い　あの声
subtitles.english: What invites you is that far, far-off voice

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎた　あなたの手も握って
subtitles.english: Gripping your hand which was too dazzling

subtitles.original: 求めるほど
subtitles.english: To the point of seeking it

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 堕ちていくと　わかっていた
subtitles.english: I knew I was falling

subtitles.original: それでも　光を追い続けていくよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I'll keep chasing the light

subtitles.original: 飛翔（はばた）いたら　戻らないと言って
subtitles.english: If you spread your wings, say you won't return

subtitles.original: 目指したのは　白い　白い　あの雲
subtitles.english: What you aimed for were those white, white clouds

subtitles.original: 突き抜けたら　みつかると知って
subtitles.english: Knowing that if you break through, you'll find it

subtitles.original: 振り切るほど
subtitles.english: To the point of shaking it off

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い　蒼い　あの空
subtitles.english: That blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: Ini ini kita kayak karaokean biasa.
subtitles.english: This is just like our usual karaoke.

subtitles.original: Aduh.
subtitles.english: Ouch.

subtitles.original: Capek, beneran?
subtitles.english: Tired, for real?

subtitles.original: Mau makan?
subtitles.english: Want to eat?

subtitles.original: Enggak.
subtitles.english: No.
